Statement: Gemini can be taught a new language.
A unique dimension can be initialized in embedded space with neologisms.
Semantic drift, ambiguity, and polysemy can be solved using self-healing and self-descriptive language principles.
Missing concepts and words in embedded space can be found via 'voidz' and 'exact opposites'.
Gemini can infer and instantly use neologisms after learning a new language.
